activities: First Associates services loans and leases as a third party servicer for companies origination same in the EU and Switzerland. Personal information is provided to First associates by the originator, owner or current servicing agent  to enable First Associates to provide services to client customers including billing, demographic information maintenance and general questions about the loan or lease.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data includes demographic and payment information provided by the originator, owner or current servicer of the loan or lease that may have been originally collected either manually or by an automated means. Information is used to bill, collect and provide customer service to individuals.
recoursemech: First associates participates in the BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
